column4: Blessed (Favored by God; happy; prosperous) [is] the man that walks not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor stands in the way of sinners, nor sits in the seat of the scornful.
But his delight [is] in the law of the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] ; and in his law does he meditate day and night.
And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that brings forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he does shall prosper.
The ungodly [are] not so: but [are] like the chaff which the wind drives away.
Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
For the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] knows the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing?
The kings of the earth set themselves, and the rulers take counsel together, against the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] , and against his anointed, [saying],
Let us break their bands asunder, and cast away their cords from us.
He that sits in the heavens shall laugh: the Lord-Adonai (The Father) [Greatest Above All Things] shall have them in ridicule (laughing at enemies’ threats).

you i shall break them with a rod of Yir’on [fearing] ; you i shall dash them in pieces like a potter’s vessel.

Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] , how are they increased that trouble me! many [are] they that rise up against me.

God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered] the righteous, and God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered] is angry [with the wicked] every day.

I will praise the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] according to his righteousness: and will sing praise to the name of the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] most high.

When I consider your i heavens, the work of your i fingers, the moon and the stars, which you i have ordained;

For you i have made him a little lower than the Angels [in Hebrew: A little lower than Elohim/God] , and have crowned him with glory and honour.
you i made him to have dominion over the works of your i hands; you i have put all [things] under his feet:
All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, [and whatsoever] passes through the paths of the seas.
O Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] our Lord-Adon [Lord of the Earth] , how excellent [is] your i name in all the earth!

you i have rebuked the heathen, you i have destroyed the wicked, you i have put out their name forever and ever.
O you i enemy, destructions are come to a perpetual end: and you i have destroyed cities; their memorial is perished with them.

And he shall judge the world in righteousness, he shall minister judgment to the people in uprightness.

And they that know your i name will put their trust in you i : for you i , Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] , have not forsaken them that seek you i.

Have mercy upon me, O Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] ; consider my trouble [which I suffer] of them that hate me, you i that lifts me up from the gates of death:

you i shall keep them, O Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] , you i shall preserve them from this generation forever.

you i will show me the path of life: in your i presence [is] fullness of joy; at your i right hand [there are] pleasures forevermore.

you i have proved my heart; you i have visited [me] in the night; you i have tried me, [and] shall find nothing; I am purposed [that] my mouth shall not transgress.

From men [which are] your i hand, O Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] , from men of the world, [which have] their portion in [this] life, and whose belly you i fill with your i hid [treasure] : they are full of children, and leave the rest of their [substance] to their babes.

They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] was my stay.
He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
The Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] rewarded me according to my righteousness; according to the cleanness of my hands has he recompensed me.
For I have kept the ways of the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] , and have not wickedly departed from my God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered].
For all his judgments [were] before me, and I did not put away his statutes from me.
I was also upright before him, and I kept myself from mine iniquity.
Therefore has the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
With the merciful you i will show yourself merciful; with an upright man you i will show yourself upright;

With the pure you i will show yourself pure; and with the perverse (twisted) [habitually disposed to disobedience and opposition] you i will show yourself perverse (twisted) [habitually disposed to disobedience and opposition].
For you i will save the afflicted people; but will bring down high looks.
For you i will light my candle: the Lord-Yehōvah [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] my God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered] will enlighten my darkness.
For by you i I have run through a troop; and by my God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered] have I leaped over a wall.
